head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PATRELLE, ELVIRA R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PATRELLE, ELVIRA R.

block.p: PATRELLE-Elvira R. Beloved wife of the late Joseph G. Devoted mother of Jospeh A. and wife Barbara and Francis. Loving sister of Alfred Recupido. Also survived by four cherished grandchildren and 8 great-grandchildren. Reposing Scotto Funeral Home, 106 1st Pl. (near Court Street), Bklyn, until Thursday. Mass of Christian Burial St. Mary Star of the Sea R.C. Church, 9:15 A.M. Visiting hours Wednesday 2-5 and 7-9:30 P.M. In lieu of flowers all donations to Dances...Patrelle, in memory of Elvira Patrelle. For any additional information call 718-875-2515.
